Info.title: Create a Project Templates Folder
Info.desc: How to setup a folder with project templates that you can reuse. Doing this will help you with the other instruction sets.

Instructions.instruction: You can skip steps 2-4 by downloading the &templates.zip&(/download/templates.zip) folder and then running the following commands in your terminal
Complete the "How to Setup a Vue Project" instruction set above. Do everything EXACTLY as it says. Don't change the names of anything.
Complete the "How to Setup a React Project" instruction set above. Do everything EXACTLY as it says. Don't change the names of anything.
Create a "templates" folder and then move your Vue and React projects into the folder using the following commands.

Code.FormatCode:
mkdir templates
mv react-project templates
mv vue-project templates
Code.CopyCode:
mkdir templates
mv react-project templates
mv vue-project templates

Instructions.instruction: In the future whenever you to make a copy of one of the templates use the following command. Replace "react-project" with whatever project template you want to use. Also replace the path with your actual new path.
